mapper.update: update link set link_url = #{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link_name = #{linkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link_img = #{linkImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link_ownername = #{linkOwnername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link_update_time = #{linkUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, link_create_time = #{linkCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, link_status = #{linkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where link_id = #{linkId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select link_id, link_url, link_name, link_img, link_ownername, link_update_time, link_create_time, link_status, user_id from link where link_id = #{linkId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select link_id, link_url, link_name, link_img, link_ownername, link_update_time, link_create_time, link_status, user_id from link
